DOC.brief_title: Clinical Research Retinal Neovascularization Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: T2DM diagnose accord World Health Organization Expert Consultation Report 1999 consist one following : fasting blood glucose ( FBG ) ≥7.0 mmol/L ( ≥126 mg/dL ) , blood glucose ≥11.1 mmol/L ( ≥200 mg/dL ) 2 hour oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) ; random blood glucose ≥11.1 mmol/L ( ≥200 mg/dL ) . DR clinically grade accordance International Clinical Diabetic Retinopathy guideline base fundus fluorescence angiography . All participant PDR underwent comprehensive dilate fundus examination detect DR indirect ophthalmoscopy diagnose fundus fluorescence angiography . Patients exclude acute complication diabetes mellitus , type 1 diabetes mellitus , type diabetes , serious cardiovascular , hepatic , nephritic complication , serious primary disease mental illness .
